product_name: Royal Robbins Briza Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: On travels abroad or trips to the climbing gym, you'll wear the women's Briza Hoodie from Royal Robbins for its soft, stretchy fabric that moves with you, dries quickly and resists wrinkles. Briza dri-release(R) fabric blends polyester, cotton and spandex to wick moisture, dry fast and stretch to keep you comfortable on the go; it also helps inhibit odor. Mesh insets at the shoulders vent excess heat and let cooler air in. Drawstring hood; zip hand pockets. The women's Royal Robbins Briza Hoodie features a regular fit and straight hem. Closeout.
short_description: On travels abroad or trips to the climbing gym, you'll wear the women's Briza Hoodie from Royal Robbins for its soft, stretchy fabric that moves with you, dries quickly and resists wrinkles.
